mapper.select: select * from jz_sync_dw where lacCode = #{lac} and ciCode = #{ci}

select distinct ciAddress addressName, ciLat lat, ciLng lng, cityName area from jz_sync_dw where cityName = #{area}
and ciAddress like CONCAT('%',#{address},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into jz_sync_dw (id, cityCode, cityName, areaCode, areaName, lacCode, lacName, ciCode, ciName, ciLat, ciLng, ciAddress, createDate ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lacCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lacName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ciCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ciName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ciLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ciLng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ciAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
